original_text: And Isaiah the prophet called to the Lord, and he brought the shadow back ten steps, by which it had gone down on the steps of Ahaz.
korean_text: 선지자 이사야가 여호와께 간구하매 아하스의 해시계 위에 나아갔던 해 그림자를 십도 뒤로 물러가게 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: And Isaiah the prophet called to the Lord
and he brought the shadow back ten steps
by which it had gone down on the steps of Ahaz
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 아하스의 계단 위로 내려왔던 것이라
